name: VRG(prototype demo)
description:
VRG was influenced by FPS such as Wolfenstein 2 The New Colossus and Titanfall.But the game progression is as old scool shooter . There are 5 levels and 1 secret level per episode.

  • Kill combo and eating gib

Defeating enemies will increase combos, increasing operability and group rate. and eating gibs will keep it. Depending on the number of combos, the enemy will scatter pieces of meat, but the combo gauge will decrease faster and will be more difficult to maintain.

  • Dual wield

You can divide the weapon into left and right by pressing the primary or secondary fire while holding down the weapon selection key. The primary is the left hand and the secondary is the right hand.
